metadata.title: CBTwear Future Ladies Man Current Mama's Boy Funny Romper Cute Novelty Infant One-piece Baby Bodysuit
features: We are proud to say that each and every one of our products are designed and printed in the USA. Our meticulous printing process involves the transfer of the ink onto the onesie, resulting in a very high-quality appearance. We manufacture all of our bodysuits with 100% cotton for a soft and stretchy, yet durable feel. This means no irritation and all-day comfort for your munchkin. All of the items we carry are shipped from our facility located in Miami, Florida or from Amazon.

This onesie makes an adorably awesome gift for anyone who has babies, knows someone with a baby, or is expecting mothers. You can gift it to an expecting mother at a baby shower, for a pregnancy announcement, any holiday, special occasion, gender reveal, due date, Mother's day present, or just because you feel like it! It doesn't just have to be for a new mom though. Little nieces, nephews, grand kids, cousins, and alike would all look their absolute cutest in this funny infant creeper.

Calling Mommy and Daddy! Our Clothing is straight outta America, if you know what we mean. We are proud to Print our novelty items in the USA. Check out all our Shirt as well as we have everything! Gifts for Brother, Mommys, grandma, grandpa everyone Babies, teens and adult. Our Clothes and Onesies are perfect for the Holiday Party. Check out our Made in Vachina, Shat my pantaloons, or our for fox sake onsies designs. Our Moms loves our Outfits and we know you would too!

Looking to have something in that Diaper bag for changing. Our Unisex Onsie is the perfect gift for Animal Lovers who have cats or dogs, our siblings have paws or tails is the cutest outfit to dress your little ones. For you wine lovers we have cute little sayings that will be sure to be a hit at any event. Check out Gangsta Napper, Daddys best Buddy, or our funny hot mom designs. You are gonna love the way your kid is going to look. Just Pick a Size and Color! Look for coupons to Save!

Mother Mama Madre Mommy Mom: Mamma, Papa can we go on Vacation? Our Matching outfits are perfect for that cruise or disney trip. We have stylish Pregnancy and maternity for the new mothers. Our Family shirts are perfect for mom, daddy, son daughter, toddler and baby. We have all of the designs: king, queen, prince, princess, bear, beauty, beast all available in all sizes and plus size if needed. They make the perfect present from aunties, uncles, grandma, and grandpa, and everyone in between.
description: The Future Ladies Man Current Mama's Boy onesie for newborns, infants, and toddlers features a witty and unique front design that is sure to give you and other adults a chuckle. As each CBTwear baby onesie is made with only the finest, high-quality materials, your baby is sure to be at their comfiest, and they will not fall apart after a few wash cycles. On top of this, our bodysuits are environmentally friendly. We only use eco-friendly ink and they each come pre-washed in chemical-free, sensitive to skin detergent for your baby's safety.   We are 100% confident in all of our products, with over 180,000 satisfied customers. However, when it comes to any possible defects or flaws in the material when received, you can contact our professional and friendly customer service team. Rest assured we will help you find a solution to your problem.   All of the baby creepers we sell are made with wonderfully soft and comfortable 100% cotton. They are pre-shrunk and pre-washed in free and clear, pure laundry detergent that is harmless to your baby's sensitive new skin. This means there is no need to wash them before their first wear.  The professional grade, fabric screen-printing paint we use is non-toxic and free of solvents and artificial fragrances. It is permanent and is further heat-pressed after the painting process to ensure absolute permanence that will never fade.   Care Instructions:  To ensure the utmost longevity and integrity of our infant onesies, there are recommended care instructions to follow:
Machine wash cold setting, on a delicate cycle.
Machine wash cold setting, on a delicate cycle.
Tumble dries on a low heat setting.
Tumble dries on a low heat setting.
Never bleach it or get it dry-cleaned.
Never bleach it or get it dry-cleaned.
Avoid ironing directly on the design.
Avoid ironing directly on the design.
